title: Filmmaker Series: Ben Harrison on The Hudsucker Proxy
itunes:title: Filmmaker Series: Ben Harrison on The Hudsucker Proxy
description:
Ben Harrison is back to continue our Coen Brothers series with their very weird, brown comedy, The Hudsucker Proxy.
